commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas978e7c6"

diff:
"978e7c6 bug 386908 - remove xpfe/communicator from Thunderbird build, r=philringnalda, NPOTFFB
diff --git a/xpfe/Makefile.in b/xpfe/Makefile.in
index 5e391df..e7c30a1 100644
--- a/xpfe/Makefile.in
+++ b/xpfe/Makefile.in
@@ -50,10 +50,6 @@ ifndef MOZ_SUNBIRD
 DIRS += browser
 endif
 
-ifdef MOZ_THUNDERBIRD
-DIRS += communicator
-endif
-
 ifndef MOZ_XUL_APP
 DIRS += global communicator
 endif
"
